criterion_0g_graduation.reasoning: This is BRAC's flagship graduation/TUP program (CFPR). While cash support is not documented in extraction, program provides direct productive assets (livestock including cows, goats, chicken) which is characteristic of graduation programs

criterion_4_design.reasoning: study_design = 'Quasi-experimental' and is_review_or_policy_analysis = false. This is an appropriate quantitative impact evaluation method
